title: Enhancing Social Presence in Blended Synchronous Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Blended synchronous learning environment where online and offline learners participate simultaneously via VR simulations and real-time video conferencing.

learning_goals: Learners can engage in at least three structured interactions with peers and instructors using VR simulation tools in a blended synchronous environment.
Learners can achieve over 80% positive responses in surveys assessing perceived social presence when collaborating on group tasks between online and offline settings.
Learners can utilize real-time video interactions at least twice as frequently as asynchronous discussion boards in a blended synchronous learning environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
